package.name: Cercube for YouTube.
package.shortDescription: Uploading videos to YouTube and more.

descriptionlist.description:
Downloads: • Download 4K video • Download as audio only • Set download quality to default • Play downloads in Material Design • Manage and transfer downloads to any application • Import downloads into music or video
Video player: • Play with Picture in Picture • Install default playback quality for 3G-4G / Wi-Fi • Auto play video at the end • Adds rewind and forward buttons • Adds speed control for playback
Improvements: • Set default start page • Enable background playback • High quality over mobile network
Settings: • Removes the "Trend" tab • Forced white keyboard.
